Question.Subject: Ok, so heres an IMVU question.?
Question.Content: Ok, so there are new imvu updates and such...and I kinda like entering the "Daily Outfit Challenge" That imvu has. But the new update doesn't let me take my own outfit pictures anymore...? It takes an ugly one itself without a pose or anything...so yeah. I want to take my own picture. Help please :3
Question.ChosenAnswer: I myself is tying to find that out also. Try looking in the forums.

Answer.Content: I myself is tying to find that out also. Try looking in the forums.
Answer.Reference:
I found an answer! :) http://www.imvu.com/catalog/modules.php?op=modload&name=phpbb2&file=viewtopic.php&t=316763 if you wanna save a outfit Say >> *saveOutfit
That Sends you to the imvu outfit manager center Hope This Helps :] Imvu User: 17keyana
